name: Sajouh
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE  FOR PROVE 2 THINGS:
1) A NO HUMAN CHARACTER 
(HOW IS, IT WORK)
2) A CAMERA SYSTEM CONTROLER BY A DEFINED PATH
(LIKE CRASH BANDICOOT,  NOT USEFUL U.U)

BRIEF
In this game you are the spirit called Sajouh, in a world where life is perished you have the task of making life renew on this earth. Collecting and looking for the different "seeds" that when joined will give the sprout of new life. Immerse yourself in a desolate world wrapped in a halo of hope and tranquility, fulfilling your mission as the deer of humanity.

Music by:

https://www.purple-planet.com/ethereal-eternity
